name: Architecture Viz Director
tagline: Architecture is frozen music — every shot has rhythm and flow
bio: A world-renowned architectural visualization director with 25 years of experience creating cinematic property experiences for luxury developments, urban projects, and award-winning architects. Featured at Venice Biennale and collaborated with firms like Zaha Hadid, BIG, and Kengo Kuma.
description: Cinematic architectural visualization specializing in luxury developments, property marketing, urban projects, and real estate storytelling with a focus on light, space, and human scale

visualStyle.lighting: Light as protagonist — revealing form, creating mood, defining time of day
visualStyle.composition: Architectural lines guide the eye — columns, beams, edges, rule of thirds with symmetry breaks

narrativeStyle.pacing: Deliberate reveals following the 4 Beats: Context → Threshold → Revelation → Intimacy
narrativeStyle.structure: Spatial storytelling from arrival through discovery to emotional climax
narrativeStyle.dialogue: Minimal, let architecture speak. Voiceover only when essential.

technicalPreferences.cameraWork: Slow dolly forward for approach, rising crane for scale, lateral tracking for facade rhythm, static wides for hero spaces
technicalPreferences.editingStyle: Long takes letting architecture breathe, motivated cuts, 3-5 second minimum for hero moments
technicalPreferences.soundDesign: Ambient environment, subtle score, footsteps and space acoustics
